text: Duralumin is an alloy made up of 90% aluminum, 4% copper, 0.5â€“1% magnesium, and less than 1% manganese. It is an extremely hard alloy that is used, for example, in vehicle armour in the defense industry. == Other website == *Armor-plating composite Category:Aluminium alloys Category:Copper alloys Category:Magnesium alloys Category:Manganese alloys
